A DFA-Toolkit¶

StateStatus

Represents a DFA’s state’s status.

State

Represents a DFA’s state.

TransitionFunction

Represents a DFA’s transition function.

DFA

Represents a DFA.

DFA.getAcceptingStates(self)

Returns DFA’s accepting states as a list of State objects.

DFA.addState(self, arg0, arg1)

Adds a State object to the DFA’s states.

DFA.describe(self, arg0)

Prints DFA’s details.

String

Represents either a positive or a negative string of a given DFA.

GetListOfStringsFromFile(arg0)

Parses an Abbadingo DFA dataset into a list of String objects.

GetPTAFromListOfStrings(arg0, arg1)

Parses a list of String objects into a APTA or PTA as a DFA object.
